get.description:
This resource provides the means to get the device introspection data specifiying all the endpoints of the device.
The url hosted by this resource is either a local or an external url.

urlInfo.description: Information on the location of the introspection data.

protocol.description: Identifier for the protocol to be used to obtain the introspection information

url.description: The URL of the introspection information.

version.description: The version of the introspection data that can be downloaded

id.description: Instance ID of this specific resource

if.description: The interface set supported by this resource
